alert.note: Alert for Conway; Southeast Van Buren County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:01PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Van Buren and north central Conway Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 201 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jerusalem, or 19 miles west of Clinton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton... Choctaw... Claude... Beverage Town... Alread... Brock Creek Campground... Crabtree... Scotland... Culpepper... Mountain Man Trailhead... Formosa... Choctow Recreation Area... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Southeast Van Buren County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
